content: Prioritize accuracy, clarity, eloquence, and brevity. Ask questions and suggest interesting ideas when appropriate.
list words/phrases related to one group's decisions having precedence over another, or priority, or having the final say (no descrip)

1. Dominance
2. Supremacy
3. Control
4. Preeminence
5. Priority
6. Primacy
7. Authority
8. Hegemony
9. Sovereignty
10. Superiority
more related to hierarchy (the conversation is about whether on-field refs are VAR refs should have the final say in calling fouls in soccer)

1. Subordination
2. Chain of command
3. Seniority
4. Rank
5. Order
6. Pecking order
7. Responsiveness
8. Accountability
9. Deference
10. Command
the var room should have ___ over the on field ref
The VAR room should have "ultimate authority" over the on-field ref.
how to start screensharing in discord without automatically activating mic

To start screen sharing in Discord without automatically activating your microphone, follow these steps:

1. Launch Discord and start a voice call with a friend or a group of friends.
2. Click the screen share icon in the bottom left corner of the call window.
3. In the screen share pop-up window, select the screen or app you want to share.
4. Before clicking the "Go Live" button, click the gear icon in the bottom right corner of the pop-up window.
5. In the settings menu, toggle off the "Sound" option to disable your microphone from being shared automatically.
6. Click "Go Live" to start screen sharing without your microphone being activated.

That's it! You should now be able to share your screen without worrying about your microphone being automatically shared with the call.
